verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and passed <S%G1276>over,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a man sick of the <S%G3885>palsy,<s%> <S%G906>lying<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G2825>bed:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> sick of the <S%G3885>palsy;<s%> Son, <S%G5043><s%> be of good <S%G2293>cheer;<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> thee. <S%G4671><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G987>blasphemeth.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Wherefore <S%G2444><s%> <S%G1760>think<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>whether<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2123>easier,<s%> to <S%G2036>say,<s%> Thy <S%G266>sins<s%> be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G4671>thee;<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> walk? <S%G4043><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> <S%G5119>(then<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he to <S%G3588>the<s%> sick of the <S%G3885>palsy,)<s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2825>bed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> which had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> unto <S%G444>men.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> passed <S%G3855>forth<s%> from <S%G1564>thence,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> receipt of <S%G5058>custom:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3427>he<s%> <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> as <S%G846>Jesus<s%> sat at <S%G345>meat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and sat <S%G4873>down<s%> with <S%G2424>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners?<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> They that be <S%G2480>whole<s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a <S%G2395>physician,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> they that are sick. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> ye and <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> that <S%G2076>meaneth,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> have <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> sacrifice: <S%G2378><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> do <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G4183>oft,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G3756>not?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3567>bridechamber<s%> <S%G3996>mourn,<s%> as long as <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them?<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> shall be <S%G522>taken<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall they fast. <S%G3522><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> No <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1911>putteth<s%> a <S%G1915>piece<s%> of <S%G46>new<s%> <S%G4470>cloth<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2440>garment,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> that which is put in to fill it up <S%G4138><s%> <S%G846><s%> taketh <S%G142><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2440>garment,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4978>rent<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> made worse. <S%G5501><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> do men <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> bottles: <S%G779><s%> <S%G1490>else<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G779>bottles<s%> <S%G4486>break,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> runneth <S%G1632>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G779>bottles<s%> perish: <S%G622><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> they <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G779>bottles,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> are preserved. <S%G4933><s%>

While <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G758>ruler,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> is even now <S%G5053>dead:<s%> <S%G737><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she shall <S%G2198>live.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> so did <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G1135>woman,<s%> which was diseased with an issue of <S%G131>blood<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%> him, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2899>hem<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> garment: <S%G2440><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> she <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>herself,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> I may <S%G3440>but<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment,<s%> I shall be <S%G4982>whole.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> turned him <S%G1994>about,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Daughter, <S%G2364><s%> be of good <S%G2293>comfort;<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> hath made thee whole. <S%G4982><s%> <S%G4571><s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> was made <S%G4982>whole<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>ruler's<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G834>minstrels<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> making a <S%G2350>noise,<s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Give place: <S%G402><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2877>maid<s%> is not dead, <S%G599><s%> <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G235><s%> sleepeth. <S%G2518><s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they laughed him to <S%G2606>scorn.<s%> <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> were put <S%G1544>forth,<s%> he went <S%G1525>in,<s%> and <S%G2902>took<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2877>maid<s%> <S%G1453>arose.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5345>fame<s%> <S%G3778>hereof<s%> went <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1093>land.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2896>crying,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Thou <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> ye <S%G3754>that<s%> I am <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> this? <S%G5124>They<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>Yea,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> he <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> According <S%G2596><s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> be <S%G1096>it<s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G455>opened;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> straitly <S%G1690>charged<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> See <S%G3708><s%> that no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> it.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they,<s%> when they were <S%G1831>departed,<s%> spread abroad his <S%G1310>fame<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1093>country.<s%>
As <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>they<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> possessed with a <S%G1139>devil.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devil<s%> was cast <S%G1544>out,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2980>spake:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It was <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5316>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> He casteth <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>prince<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devils.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> he was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G4012>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2258>fainted,<s%> <S%G1590><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were scattered <S%G4496>abroad,<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he unto <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2326>harvest<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> is <S%G4183>plenteous,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> are few; <S%G3641><s%>

Pray <S%G1189><s%> ye <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2326>harvest,<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he will send <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
